title: Watch Face Scoon Padrino
summary: Complex animated stylish watch face , weather info, millions of combinations.
description: Original design exclusive watch faceMillions of combinationsThis watch face is unique and no copy. The Scoon Padrino is the most complicated watch face available at this moment. It took hundreds of hours to make these complex animations to work. The gear covers can be hidden or set to  rotate when tilting wrist  by using your watches accelerometer. You can change settings live and on the watch. No need to do this in your mobile phone.This watch is made for Android Wear watches like the Motorola 360 and the LG G Watch Round. It includes a square dial so it can be used on square watches like the LG ZenWatch.Please rate us positive if you like our work! Don't give a bad rating too soon. We see that some users don't know to find a setting. We can help you with that.Why the Padrino is the most fantastic smart watch face:★Millions of combinations can be created to suit any mood.★ It has complex transparent animations★ Accelerometer effects are implemented★ Weather information is available★ You can set options live on the watch by swiping and ticking★ All gears turn in a complex way to give you that realistic look★ You can set the Tourbillon or disable it.★ It has the ultimate millionair factor★ You can make numerous combinations. You are getting a lot of watches in this app.★ You can choose for skeleton look or set beautiful dials★ premium metals have been used to create the best apearance★ Many hours are invested in this design. It is the most complex watch face app today available.★ You can set date and power indicators and their location★ You can choose analog or digital indicators★ You can choose modern style or classic hands★ Also features a square design★ Future improvements and updates will follow... How to change/ build your ultimate watch:- buy and download our app and wait till the watch face shows up in your watch- select the Padrino by long clicking your watch face and then ticking the gear symbol below. Or set it in the Android Wear app on your phone- when activated on your watch go to the settings of Padrino in the Android Wear app of your phone- select your flavors of choice and change rotations speeds if preferred in the Android Wear app on your phone- if our watch face doesn't show up in your watch please try to restart your watch. It can take some time to load this complex watch- change your preferences by long clicking the watch face. Then swipe up. descriptionHTML:
Original design exclusive watch face
Millions of combinations

This watch face is unique and no copy.
The Scoon Padrino is the most complicated watch face available at this moment. It took hundreds of hours to make these complex animations to work. The gear covers can be hidden or set to rotate when tilting wrist by using your watches accelerometer. You can change settings live and on the watch. No need to do this in your mobile phone.

This watch is made for Android Wear watches like the Motorola 360 and the LG G Watch Round. It includes a square dial so it can be used on square watches like the LG ZenWatch.

Please rate us positive if you like our work! Don't give a bad rating too soon. We see that some users don't know to find a setting. We can help you with that.

Why the Padrino is the most fantastic smart watch face:
★Millions of combinations can be created to suit any mood.
★ It has complex transparent animations
★ Accelerometer effects are implemented
★ Weather information is available
★ You can set options live on the watch by swiping and ticking
★ All gears turn in a complex way to give you that realistic look
★ You can set the Tourbillon or disable it.
★ It has the ultimate millionair factor
★ You can make numerous combinations. You are getting a lot of watches in this app.
★ You can choose for skeleton look or set beautiful dials
★ premium metals have been used to create the best apearance
★ Many hours are invested in this design. It is the most complex watch face app today available.
★ You can set date and power indicators and their location
★ You can choose analog or digital indicators
★ You can choose modern style or classic hands
★ Also features a square design
★ Future improvements and updates will follow...

How to change/ build your ultimate watch:
- buy and download our app and wait till the watch face shows up in your watch
- select the Padrino by long clicking your watch face and then ticking the gear symbol below. Or set it in the Android Wear app on your phone
- when activated on your watch go to the settings of Padrino in the Android Wear app of your phone
- select your flavors of choice and change rotations speeds if preferred in the Android Wear app on your phone
- if our watch face doesn't show up in your watch please try to restart your watch. It can take some time to load this complex watch
- change your preferences by long clicking the watch face. Then swipe up. Swipe and tick to select.
- pull your sleeve up so everybody asks what awesome watch you have on your wrist

Support us and follow us on
http://www.facebook.com/scoonwear
http://plus.google.com/+scoondesign
http://www.scoonwear.com

More complicated watch faces will follow from Marc Notenboom and Wes Scoggin @ Scoon Wear
comments: Purchased this a wile ago when I had my older not so nice not 360 with no features and terrible screen resolution and it worked fine now that I have a much nicer newer lg urbane 2nd edition that is superior to the Moto 360 in every way I cannot change any settings on this watch face same issue that other user had unable to change any settings very frustrating because I love the look of this watch face
Cannot change look No matter what I do to change look of face, nothing happens on Tag Heuer watch.
My watch face does not look like depicted. The gears don't show around bezel. Only at the top. I want the one shown. Help please
Very nice face Very nice faces that are customizable.  Face is very busy until you get used to it. All in all a very nice watch face.
Fantastic live watch face for the Moto 360.
recentChanges: -added compatibility for higher resolution screens like the Huawei Watch.
Changed weather provider url to provide more reliable weather
-Added Color picker. Choose any of the three metal materials, or choose another color with a color picker.
-Top position now available for all widgets
